title: Cranberry Salsa with Cream Cheese
directions: Place all of the ingredients in a food processor and pulse until desired consistency. I like mine fairly fine. Chill in the fridge for a couple of hours (preferably overnight) to allow the salsa to macerate. Serve over cream cheese and with crackers.
ingredients: ¾ cup granulated sugar (add more to taste)
1 jalapeno, seeded and chopped coarsely (leave the seeds in if you like it spicy)
